pinyin: Yue1 han4 · Huo4 jin1 si1 Da4 xue2

sentences.english: John has a windfall . It surprises his wife greatly .
sentences.chinese: 約翰意外獲得一筆財富，使他夫人大喫一驚。

sentences.english: Who seeing Peter and John about to go into the temple asked an alms.
sentences.chinese: 他看見彼得約翰將要進殿，就求他們賙濟。

sentences.english: He has three good friends, such as Mary , Jhon.
sentences.chinese: 他有三個好朋友，如瑪麗和約翰。

sentences.english: It covers what the apostle John saw in a vision on the Island of Patmos.
sentences.chinese: 它記錄了使徒約翰在拔摩海島所看到的異象。

sentences.english: We know it was written by a guy named John.
sentences.chinese: 我們知道它的作者是一個名叫約翰的人。

sentences.english: That's John. He lives with the Wang family.
sentences.chinese: 那是約翰，他和王家的人住一起。

sentences.english: When the jury pronounced him guilty of murder, john did not bat an eye.
sentences.chinese: 當陪審團宣判約翰犯有謀殺罪時，他面不改色。

sentences.english: Behind the tip of the A, behind the plateau of Mont -Saint-Jean, is the forest of Soignes.
sentences.chinese: 在A字的尖頂和聖約翰山高地後面的，是索瓦寧森林。

sentences.english: John's about to start a nine-week national speaking tour.
sentences.chinese: 約翰即將展開一場歷時九周的全國巡迴演講。

sentences.english: John couldn't even pick up the box, much less carry it upstairs.
sentences.chinese: 約翰連這箱子提都提不起來，更別說把它搬上樓了。

sentences.english: I think there's a walleye on that one, " said Johnson."
sentences.chinese: “我認爲有一個白斑上的，”約翰遜說。

sentences.english: At the last lap John held him,and then began to pick up on him.
sentences.chinese: 在最後一圈約翰追上了他，並開始超過他。

sentences.english: Mary is out of John's league.
John seemed to be off his feed, he did not joke and laugh with the others.
sentences.chinese: 約翰似乎有心事，他不跟別人說說笑笑。

definition: Roth (name)/Kenneth Roth (1955-), executive director of Human Rights Watch 人權觀察|人权观察[Ren2 quan2 Guan1 cha2]
Washington (name)/George Washington (1732-1799), first US president/Washington, US State/Washington, D.C. (US federal capital)
legendary/fantasy saga/romance/short stories of the Tang and Song Dynasty
